name: Tank Toy
description:
The game is in development. Everything is susceptible of being changed.

Fight against smart tanks controlled by a neural network!

The agents have been trained using ML-Agents for 34 hours, but feel free to blow them up.

Modes:
3v3: Play against a team of 3 enemy tanks along with 2 allies.
3v1: Play alone agains the enemy team (Pros only).
Spectator: Observe the IA's fighting among them (More epic than it seems). 

Controls:
wasd - Move the tank
Mouse Movement- Rotate camera
Left Mouse Click - Shoot
O  - Back to Menu
I  - Information tab

Spectator Only Controls:
C - Change between tank POV and top view
Left and Right arrows - Change between tanks POV
